memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8 *Data, uint16 DataLength, Dcm_OpStatusType OpStatus, Dcm_NegativeResponseCodeType *ErrorCode)
memberdef.name: shewrite_Write_Adaption_0xEFC5

briefdescription.para: This function is used to handle UDS write request(0x2E, DID 0xEFC5) for provisioning keys related to SHE and SHE+ key range slots.

detaileddescription.para:
The internal valriables are initialized with the default values.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous
NA
NA
Data pointer
to data which shall be forwarded to SHE_LoadKey API DataLength, length of payload at parameter Data OpStatus, status of DCM stack ErrorCode, pointer to be filled by function with the result of the function execution
E_OK (write was successful) or E_NOT_OK (see ErrorCode for reason) or 10 (which is RTE_PENDING, expect to be called again)
Globals
NA
Input->Output-Correlation
NA
Call Sequence
shewrite_Write_Adaption_0xEFC5 Activity Diagram
Test Method
the testing method is described on:
Verification criteria
Test case shall be based on the different values provided as input for datalength, SHE states and the data TEST_shewrite_Write_Adaption_0xEFC5_TC1
Traceability

to data which shall be forwarded to SHE_LoadKey API DataLength, length of payload at parameter Data OpStatus, status of DCM stack ErrorCode, pointer to be filled by function with the result of the function execution
